name: You?

description: This is your spot to take! We want to hear your story. Get in touch with us and we're happy to host you!

name: Jon Edvald, VP of Engineering @ Clue
title: Monorepos - The good and the bad and the why
description: Recently Clue migrated all of their backend services and packages to a single repository (monorepo). Jon will talk about the motivation for doing that and dive into the many benefits and challenges involved, with a special focus on issues related to Node.js and NPM packages.
